text: Park Jin-woo (born July 3, 1983) is a South Korean actor. He made his acting debut in 2004 with the romantic comedy My Little Bride and sitcom Nonstop 5. Park has since starred in films and television series such as Dasepo Naughty Girls (2006), Frivolous Wife (2008), I'll Give You Everything (2009), and Love On A Rooftop (2015). == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable" style="width:500px" |- ! width=10|Year !
